rhq:input-property.name: port-set
rhq:input-property.description: This is the ports set to use for JBoss, defined as: default, 01, 02, 03 etc...

rhq:input-property.name: instance
rhq:input-property.description: This is the instance whose port set will be changed: all, production, default, web, standard

rhq:input-property.name: start-server
rhq:input-property.description: This specifies if the server should be started after deployment

rhq:input-property.name: jmx-admin-password
rhq:input-property.description: This specifies the password to be used for the admin user to log into the JMX console

target.name: postinstall
target.echo: Updating JMX users admin password to ${jmx-admin-password}...
Setting port attribute for ${instance} to ports-${port-set}.
Done deploying EAP 5.1.1 vanilla bundle to ${rhq.deploy.dir}.
Changing permissions, owner and group to ${jboss-user}.
